thread.title: Asian markets slide on Facebook and Fed concerns

title: Asian markets slide on Facebook and Fed concerns
text:
Asian markets slide on Facebook and Fed concerns 10:14am GMT - 00:46 
Asian shares fell on Tuesday after investors dumped US technology shares in the wake of a scandal surrounding Facebook. The retreat came ahead of new Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell's first policy meeting, which could offer more clues on the health of the US economy.   
Asian shares fell on Tuesday after investors dumped US technology shares in the wake of a scandal surrounding Facebook. The retreat came ahead of new Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell's first policy meeting, which could offer more clues on the health of the US economy.  //reut.rs/2IEFpNa
